info.name: Nyaruko For Roblox
info.description: Nyaruko is a anime so you all dont get confused. i guess there will be spoilers of the anime in these images so if you actually watched it then your fine.
info.additionalInfo: i actually loved this anime it was really good and i got way to emotionally attached to the anime and started crying when i found out the voice actor of kuuko died and they stopped making the anime. tbh i was suprised that nobody made a background of this anime also despite the fact i expected nobody do even make one because its so underrated and unknown of a anime
